text: un logo ko jo bade gunaaho se bachte hai aur be hayaayi se bhi, sivaaye kisi chote se gunaah ke, beshak tera rab bahuth kushaada maghfirath waala hai, wo tumhe ba qoobi jaanta hai, jab ke us ne tumhe zameen se payda kiya aur jab ke tum apni maao ke pet mein bacche thein, pas tum apni paakizgi aap bayaan na karo, wahi parhezgaaro ko qoob jaanta hai
